home.meta_description: Welcome to the official portfolio of Camilla. Discover the journey of grace, intelligence, and determination of a Miss Universe contestant.
home.title: The Aura of the Universe
home.subtitle: Embodying grace, intelligence, and determination. Discover Camilla's journey.

about.meta_description: Learn about Camilla's journey, her passions, and the causes she champions. An insight into her biography, achievements, and advocacy work.
about.title: About Camilla
about.subtitle: An insight into my journey, my passions, and the causes I champion.
about.journey_p1: From a small town with big dreams, my path has been one of relentless pursuit of knowledge, purpose, and positive impact. My journey into the world of pageantry began not as a quest for a crown, but as a search for a platform to amplify the voices of the unheard and to champion the causes close to my heart.
about.journey_p2: Studying International Relations, I developed a deep understanding of the global challenges we face and the interconnectedness of our world. This academic background fuels my passion for advocacy, providing me with the tools to analyze complex issues and work towards sustainable solutions.
about.advocacy_p1: My core mission is to advocate for quality education and mental health awareness. Through my 'Empower Her' initiative, I work to dismantle barriers that prevent young women from accessing education. I believe that an educated woman has the power to uplift her entire community.
about.advocacy_p2: Simultaneously, I am a fervent advocate for de-stigmatizing mental health conversations. By sharing stories and promoting resources, I aim to create a world where seeking help for mental well-being is seen as a sign of strength, not weakness.
about.achievements_subtitle: A timeline of key milestones on my journey so far.

achievements.title: National Miss Universe Title
achievements.description: Crowned as the national representative, a culmination of years of dedication and hard work.

achievements.title: University of Excellence, Dean's List
achievements.description: Achieved academic excellence in International Relations, balancing rigorous studies with pageant preparations.

achievements.title: Founder of 'Empower Her' Initiative
achievements.description: Launched a non-profit organization dedicated to providing educational resources for underprivileged girls.

achievements.title: Goodwill Ambassador for Children's Health
achievements.description: Partnered with global health organizations to advocate for better healthcare access for children in rural areas.

advocacy_page.meta_description: Learn about Camilla's advocacy work for educational equity and mental health awareness. Using her platform to create meaningful change.
advocacy_page.title: My Advocacy
advocacy_page.subtitle: Using my platform to create meaningful change and uplift communities.

items.title: Educational Equity for Women
items.description: Championing the right to education for every girl and woman. My 'Empower Her' initiative provides scholarships, mentorship, and resources to help young women in underserved communities achieve their academic and professional dreams. I believe education is the key to unlocking potential and breaking cycles of poverty.

items.title: Mental Health Awareness
items.description: Dedicated to de-stigmatizing mental health and promoting accessible resources. I work with organizations to create safe spaces for dialogue, share powerful stories of recovery, and advocate for policies that integrate mental healthcare into our communities and schools. Your mental well-being matters.

qa_page.meta_description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about Camilla, her views on the Miss Universe title, her inspirations, and her message to the world.
qa_page.title: Q&A
qa_page.subtitle: Answering some of your most frequently asked questions.

items.question: What does the Miss Universe title mean to you?
items.answer: To me, the Miss Universe title is not just a crown; it's a microphone. It represents a powerful platform to amplify important global conversations, connect with people from all walks of life, and take meaningful action on the causes I am passionate about, such as educational equity and mental health awareness.

items.question: How do you handle the pressure of competition?
items.answer: I handle pressure by staying grounded in my purpose. I remind myself why I started this journey—to make a difference. Practicing mindfulness, maintaining a strong support system of family and friends, and focusing on personal growth rather than just the outcome are essential parts of my routine.

items.question: What is your biggest source of inspiration?
items.answer: My biggest inspiration comes from the resilience and strength of the young women I meet through my advocacy work. Their determination to overcome incredible obstacles to pursue their education and dreams fuels my own drive and reminds me of the profound impact we can have on one another's lives.

items.question: What is one message you would like to share with young girls around the world?
items.answer: I want every young girl to know that her voice has power and her dreams are valid. Do not be afraid to be ambitious, to be intelligent, and to be compassionate. Embrace your unique qualities, for they are your greatest strengths. Never underestimate the change you can create in the world.

items.question: How do you define 'beauty with a purpose'?
items.answer: 'Beauty with a purpose' means using one's visibility and influence for the greater good. It's about recognizing that true beauty lies in our actions, our empathy, and our commitment to leaving the world a better place than we found it. It's about service, substance, and impact.
